name: Cactus Block on everyday!!
description:
This is the sister game to my other GMTK jam entry, Cactus Block on adventure!

This game is a simple score attack / time attack game with a single level. After making it, I expanded it to an adventure-game with multiple levels where the goal is to clear all levels.

If you like this game, please try Cactus Block on adventure! as well.

Known Bug

If you play Cactus Block on adventure! it will erase your score data for this game because they accidentally share the same save file. Well, that's just how it is.
